This document outlines the equations for models A and B.
Simply knit this `.Rmd` document to get a pdf with rendered equations.

# Model A

## Differential equations

When solving for parameters to produce desired equilibria, midges (M) are omitted


$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dN}{dt} &= i_N - a_{NP} N P (1-P/k_P) + (1-l_D) m_D D - m_N N\\
\frac{dD}{dt} &= (1-l_P) m_P P + (1-l_V) m_V V + (1-l_H) m_H H + (1-l_R) m_R R + (1 - l_M) m_M M - a_{DV} D V (1-V/k_V) - m_D D \\
\frac{dP}{dt} &= a_{NP} N P (1-P/k_P) - a_{PH} P H (1-H/k_H) - m_P P \\
\frac{dV}{dt} &= a_{DV} D V (1-V/k_V) - (a_R V R) (1-R/k_R) - m_V V \\
\frac{dH}{dt} &= a_{PH} P H (1-H/k_H) - (a_R H R) (1-R/k_R) - m_H H \\
\frac{dR}{dt} &= (a_R V R + a_R H R + a_R M R) (1-R/k_R) - m_R R \\
\frac{dM}{dt} &= i_M - m_M M - a_R M R) (1-R/k_R) \\
\end{aligned}
$$



# Model B

## Differential equations

When solving for parameters to produce desired equilibria, midges (M) are omitted


$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dN}{dt} &= i_N - a_{NP} N P (1-P/k_P) + (1-l_D) m_D D - m_N N\\
\frac{dD}{dt} &= (1-l_P) m_P P + (1-l_V) m_V V + (1-l_H) m_H H + (1-l_R) m_R R + (1-l_M) m_M M -
    \frac{a_{DV} D V}{1+a_{DV} h_D D} - m_D D \\
\frac{dP}{dt} &= a_{NP} N P (1-P/k_P) - \frac{a_{PH} P H}{1+a_{PH} h_P P} - m_P P \\
\frac{dV}{dt} &= \frac{a_{DV} D V}{1+a_{DV} h_D D} - \frac{a_R V R}{1+a_R h_R (V+H+M)} - m_V V \\
\frac{dH}{dt} &= \frac{a_{PH} P H}{1+a_{PH} h_P P} - \frac{a_R H R}{1+a_R h_R (V+H+M)} - m_H H \\
\frac{dR}{dt} &= \frac{a_R V R + a_R H R + a_R M R}{1+a_R h_R (V+H+M)} - m_R R \\
\frac{dM}{dt} &= i_M - m_M M - \frac{a_R M R}{1+a_R h_R (V+H+M)} \\
\end{aligned}
$$
